# 10 Best Bluetooth In Ear Headphones in 2020

By

[Music Critic Staff](https://musiccritic.com/meetthewriters.htm)

-

Last Updated: July 1, 2020

[![Woman with wireless earbuds](https://musiccritic.com/wp/wp-
content/uploads/2019/12/Young-woman-hearing-music-using-wireless-bluetooth-
earphones.jpg)](https://musiccritic.com/wp/wp-content/uploads/2019/12/Young-
woman-hearing-music-using-wireless-bluetooth-earphones.jpg)

Listening to music while on the go usually requires a pair of reliable
headphones, and if exercise is part of your daily routine, in-ear headphones
are what you need. Not just any pair will do, though. You need a product that
will live up to your expectations both when it comes to sound, durability, and
special functions. Do you want a pair of buds that can match the sound of the
Apple Airpods Pro without the price tag? Then keep reading.

Table of Contents

  * View The Best Bluetooth In Ear Headphones
    * 1\. iKanzi Wireless Earbuds iPX7
    * 2\. SoundPEATS Bluetooth Headphones
    * 3\. Mpow Flame Bluetooth Headphones
    * 4\. Bose SoundSport Wireless Headphones
    * 5\. SoundPEATS Bluetooth Earphones
    * 6\. TOZO T10 True Wireless Stereo
    * 7\. ACIL Bluetooth Headphones
    * 8\. Sony Extra Bass Bluetooth Headphones
    * 9\. Phaiser BHS-530 Bluetooth
    * 10\. Anker SoundBuds Curve Wireless Headphones
  * Wireless In-Ear Headphones Buyers Guide
    * This Is An In-Ear Headphone
    * Perfect Fit
    * Noise Reduction
    * What are the best budget wireless headphones?
    * Do I have to wear in-ear headphones when working out?
    * Conclusion
    * If you've enjoyed this review by Music Critic, please leave a positive rating:

We have listed the top 10 wireless headphones to make your decision-making
process easier. We've also included some tips and tricks on everything from
the battery to the sound, and we'll help you decide whether you need a pair
that's truly wireless. You'll have everything you need to find the right
product for you, to save you some trouble in your search.

## View The Best Bluetooth In Ear Headphones

### 1\. iKanzi Wireless Earbuds iPX7

[![iKanzi Wireless Earbuds iPX7](//musiccritic.com/wp/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![iKanzi
Wireless Earbuds iPX7](https://m.media-
amazon.com/images/I/41TCyjtSLbL.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07G9YJ8GD?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

[Find Lowest Price](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07G9YJ8GD?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

If you want your headphones to be true wireless, battery time becomes highly
relevant. The charging case that comes with these can charge the truly
wireless earphones up to 18 times, which means you get a total battery life of
72 hours.

These true wireless earbuds are waterproofed to withstand sweat and rain. This
is essential when you want to be able to go running, no matter the weather.
They have automatic pairing; you don’t have to click any buttons to turn these
true wireless earbuds on and off after charging the battery life.

The built-in [high-quality
audio](https://musiccritic.com/equipment/headphones/best-quality-headphones/)
chip creates an audio experience that places you right in the middle of the
music you're listening to. The Bluetooth 5.0 makes sure you are provided with
an uninterrupted, balanced sound.

 **Pros:**  
\+ Built-in high-quality audio chip  
\+ With highly compatible Bluetooth 5.0  
\+ IPX7 waterproof against sweat and rain  
\+ Automatic pairing and power on  
\+ Comes with a carrying case for wireless charging

 **Why We Liked It** \- You don’t have to worry about pushing any buttons to
turn these true wireless earbuds on and off. They activate automatically
whenever you put them in or take them out of the charging case. You'll never
run out of battery with the case. That makes them one of the best wireless
earbuds.

### 2\. SoundPEATS Bluetooth Headphones

[![ SoundPEATS Bluetooth Headphones](//musiccritic.com/wp/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![ SoundPEATS
Bluetooth Headphones](https://m.media-
amazon.com/images/I/41ZsRVoCMcL.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07MX1XL1V?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

[Find Lowest Price](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07MX1XL1V?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

Each charge gives you 3.5 hours of uninterrupted listening and HiFi stereo
sound for phone calls and music. You can use only one of the headphones, or
both, and get that same impeccable sound experience you're looking for.

If you want the best-sounding truly wireless earbuds that you can use for all
your daily activities, consider these. They have the sound quality, ease of
use, and a warranty that you can use for 12 months. The charging case will
charge the battery life up within a couple of hours. You'll no longer have to
deal with cables tangling when you are trying to listen to your sound. The
easy pairing is another great feature of these truly wireless buds.

 **Pros:**  
\+ Music and phonecall HiFi stereo sound  
\+ For single and couple use  
\+ Stable and tangle-free transmission  
\+ 12-month reliable warranty

 **Why We Liked It** \- You get impressive HiFi stereo sound both when you're
making calls and when you are listening to music. This sets these top-rated
truly wireless earbuds apart from other products, as well as previous
versions.

### 3\. Mpow Flame Bluetooth Headphones

[![ Mpow Flame Bluetooth Headphones](//musiccritic.com/wp/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![ Mpow Flame
Bluetooth Headphones](https://m.media-
amazon.com/images/I/41+2VOSx0XL.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B077FRLKJX?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

[Find Lowest Price](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B077FRLKJX?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

These top-rated wireless earbuds go inside the ear, where they provide a
comfortable fit. They're perfect for when you're out running or exercising.
They have noise cancellation technology in each wireless earbud, making sure
you can hear your music and your phone calls in noisy environments.

Mpow has included a special cable for charging, to give you the exact right
voltage to protect both these wireless earphones and the cable itself. It
takes only 2 hours to charge these wireless earbuds, and you get a total of
7-9 hours of battery life on a single charge.

The Bluetooth dual point connection enables you to use two different devices,
effortlessly switching between the two so that you can focus fully on your
workout.

 **Pros:**  
\+ Dual-point connection Bluetooth  
\+ 7-9 hours of uninterrupted playtime  
\+ Charging cable included  
\+ Interior Nano-coating waterproof technology

 **Why We Liked It** \- The seven to nine hours of battery life offered by
these wireless earbuds makes them some of the best wireless earbuds currently
available.

### 4\. Bose SoundSport Wireless Headphones

[![Bose SoundSport Wireless Headphones](//musiccritic.com/wp/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![Bose
SoundSport Wireless Headphones](https://m.media-
amazon.com/images/I/311Tl85STIL.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01L7PSJFO?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

[Find Lowest Price](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01L7PSJFO?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

NFC pairing and Bluetooth, along with voice prompts and 6 hours of battery
life, make this a set of the best wireless earbuds you can find. Bose is a
brand that has been delivering quality electronics for decades. This shows in
the clever construction of these in-ear wireless earphones they have produced
in years, where the focus lies on portability, function, and durability.

The StayHear+ [sports
earbuds](https://musiccritic.com/equipment/headphones/best-sports-earbuds/)
are uniquely designed to fit right into any ear, and to stay put for as long
as you need them. You can hear and feel that they are authentic Bose earbuds.
It's no wonder they are considered one of the best wireless headsets.

 **Pros:**  
\+ Rain and sweat resistant  
\+ Six hours of battery life  
\+ Stays in place when working out  
\+ Nicely balanced sound

 **Why We Liked It** \- For those who want the best wireless earbuds for
working out, these won’t disappoint with their long battery life and stay-on
design.

### 5\. SoundPEATS Bluetooth Earphones

[![ SoundPEATS Bluetooth Earphones](//musiccritic.com/wp/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![ SoundPEATS
Bluetooth Earphones](https://m.media-amazon.com/images/I/31CUKd-
FzXL.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B074THH5Q2?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

[Find Lowest Price](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B074THH5Q2?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

The sound quality of the best wireless earbuds needs to live up to certain
standards. Here, you get balanced sound quality that resembles the crystal
clear audio of a CD, thanks to the APTX codec with CSR8645 Bluetooth chips.
One to two hours of charging gives you a total of 8 hours of battery life.
This allows you to always be ready to listen to your favorite music or take
that important business call.

You can get it in black, white, or red, depending on what your preferences
are. You also get an in-line mic with button control, along with five
differently sized ear tips to better accommodate the unique shape of your
inner ears.

 **Pros:**  
\+ Five ear tip sizes included  
\+ High fidelity sound quality  
\+ Button control and in-line mic  
\+ Available in red, black and white

 **Why We Liked It** \- Everyone’s ears look different, and these wireless
earbuds come with five different ear tip sizes. That, combined with the
battery life, makes them a set Bluetooth earbuds to rave about.

### 6\. TOZO T10 True Wireless Stereo

[![](//musiccritic.com/wp/wp-content/plugins/a3-lazy-
load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![](https://m.media-
amazon.com/images/I/51RmMzFVwCL.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07J2Z5DBM?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

[Find Lowest Price](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07J2Z5DBM?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

The authenticity of the sound comes from a balanced bass, clear midrange, and
treble performance, creating a unique audio experience that you rarely expect
to get out of such tiny wireless earbuds. Bluetooth headphone reviews
constantly rave about them, due to their superb audio quality, automatic
pairing, and comfortable and ergonomic design.

The perfectly fitted earbud caps help reduce ambient noise, setting you up for
crystal clear sound. The truly wireless earbuds pair automatically, both with
one another and with your cellphone. There are no cords to worry about, as
it's a fully wireless experience, contributing to them becoming some of the
best wireless Bluetooth earphones for sports and traveling.

These truly wireless earbuds have a battery life of 4 hours, which may not
seem like a lot, but they also come with a charging case. This charging case
provides 14 more battery life. Getting a pair of wireless earphones with a
charging case is always a good investment because not only will the charging
case provide extra battery life, but you'll also have somewhere to keep them.
You'll never lose your wireless earbuds again!

 **Pros:**  
\+ Ergonomic and comfortable design  
\+ Balanced bass and clear midrange  
\+ Ambient noise reduction  
\+ Easy and quick pairing  
\+ True wireless earbuds - comes with a charging case

 **Why We Liked It** \- For a product to qualify as the best wireless
earphones, they need great, blanaced sound quality, and they need to be
comfortable to wear. These have both making them one of the best wireless
earbuds on the market!

### 7\. ACIL Bluetooth Headphones

[![](//musiccritic.com/wp/wp-content/plugins/a3-lazy-
load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![](https://m.media-
amazon.com/images/I/31YibslSupL.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07ZF8893F?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

[Find Lowest Price](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07ZF8893F?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

Both earbuds are magnetic so that you can hang them around your neck and click
them together safely and securely when not using them. Rich bass, dynamic
drivers, clear treble, and buttons to play and pause music, take calls, and
change the volume, plus 11 hours of battery life on a single charge and
comfortable ear tips all come together to make a set of top Bluetooth
earphones.

These wireless earbuds also have a magnetic clasp design, allowing you to
place them effortlessly around your neck. This means you'll avoid losing them
or having to store them somewhere. They are highly runner-friendly, thanks to
the waterproof materials. This means you won’t have to worry about sweating a
little more than usual, or about it raining when you least expect it.

 **Pros:**  
\+ Liquid highly flexible silicone  
\+ IPX5 waterproof & magnetic clasp  
\+ 11 hours of uninterrupted playtime  
\+ Dynamic 8mm drivers

 **Why We Liked It** \- These are not just good wireless headphones - they are
some of the best wireless earbuds available. They are lightweight and
comfortable to wear.

### 8\. Sony Extra Bass Bluetooth Headphones

[![Sony Extra Bass Bluetooth Headphones](//musiccritic.com/wp/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![Sony Extra
Bass Bluetooth Headphones](https://m.media-

[Find Lowest Price](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B01KOE179Y?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

This list is all about in-ear [Sony
headphones](https://musiccritic.com/equipment/headphones/best-sony-
headphones/), and we're going to bring forward these high-quality earphones,
for those who want to compare the best rated wireless headphones.

These wireless earbuds have a battery life of 8.5 hours. They also have a
built in microphone, meaning you can take calls hands free. The frequency
response makes for excellent sound quality. They're available in three colors,
so you can listen to your sound in style. The design is splash-proof, making
these wires earbuds a great choice if you're prone to taking walks in the
rain, or like to work out.

 **Pros:**  
\+ Wide frequency response  
\+ A high battery life  
\+ Comes in different colors  
\+ Built-in microphone

 **Why We Liked It** \- These are some of the most comfortable wireless
headphones you can get, especially if you struggle to wear even the best
wireless earbuds. They're a good option if you for example plan to travel with
them.

### 9\. Phaiser BHS-530 Bluetooth

[![Phaiser BHS-530 Bluetooth](//musiccritic.com/wp/wp-content/plugins/a3-lazy-
load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![Phaiser BHS-530
Bluetooth](https://m.media-
amazon.com/images/I/415ZitKRVGL.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B072L44Y4M?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

[Find Lowest Price](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B072L44Y4M?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

These were some of the best [wireless
earbuds](https://musiccritic.com/equipment/headphones/best-wireless-earbuds/)
in 2017, and the best earbuds 2018, and better yet - they still remain as one
of the top in-ear products! The Bluetooth 4.1, combined with powerful 8mm
speakers, provides an impressive audio experience - unique and surprising. The
ear tips have memory foam for a perfect fit.

These wireless earbuds are ideal to wear for hours at a time, without
experiencing discomfort, and for noise reduction. Liquipel Nano coating
protects the headphones from getting damaged if it rains or when you sweat.
You get a lifetime sweatproof warranty, and you can safely wear them around
your neck for instant access wherever you are.

 **Pros:**  
\+ Bluetooth 4.1 and 8mm speakers  
\+ Multi-size memory foam EarTips  
\+ Easy to wear around your neck  
\+ Lifetime sweatproof guarantee

 **Why We Liked It** \- You won’t have to worry about sweating heavily with
these wireless earbuds, as they can even be accidentally dropped in water
without malfunctioning!

### 10\. Anker SoundBuds Curve Wireless Headphones

[![Anker SoundBuds Curve Wireless Headphones](//musiccritic.com/wp/wp-
content/plugins/a3-lazy-load/assets/images/lazy_placeholder.gif)![Anker
SoundBuds Curve Wireless Headphones](https://m.media-
amazon.com/images/I/41HGN3vNIML.jpg)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0721MP41Q?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

[Find Lowest Price](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0721MP41Q?tag=musiccritic-
search-20&linkCode=ogi&th=1&psc=1)

When you use these wireless earbuds at 80% volume, you get an impressive 18
hours of uninterrupted battery life. This battery life is enough for when you
go on a long trip or have little time to charge them up in between runs. You
will no longer find yourself unable to listen to your favorite songs, or
unable to take that important business call you had been expecting.

BassUp technology improves the sound of the bass with 43%. It has a quick-
charging mode and - surprisingly - is so waterproof that you can rinse it with
water without damaging the electronics. The flexible bio-cellulose dome sits
comfortably around the ear. It stays on also when doing high-energy type of
exercise, making it one of the best wireless headsets for enthusiastic workout
fanatics.

 **Pros:**  
\+ Safe to rinse with water  
\+ Up to 18 hours of listening time  
\+ 43% improved the bass sound  
\+ With the quick-charge mode

 **Why We Liked It** \- In a hurry? Don't worry; all you have to do is charge
these for 10 minutes. They will give you a total of 3 hours of extra battery
life. Never worry about running out of battery life again.

## Wireless In-Ear Headphones Buyers Guide

There are so many different things you can use a set of headphones for; you
can use them to listen to music when walking and exercising, to take calls
while needing your hands for something else, or to watch funny videos on
social media in public and much more. But it isn’t just about what you want to
use your headphones for - it matters what kinds of headphones you decide to go
with! Do you want wireless earbuds or a true wireless pair? Is noise
cancellation technology important to you? Not getting the ones that are right
for you can mean that you'll be uncomfortable wearing them or that they won’t
stay in your ears while you move around.

Looking through a wireless earbuds review is a great way to find quality
products, but you also need to know what to look for to find what's right for
you. Whether you're looking for the best Bluetooth over-ear headphones or the
best true wireless earbuds, the perfect product is out there for you. This is
a guide to help you find a pair of good wireless earbuds that fit your needs.

### This Is An In-Ear Headphone

To find the best wireless earbuds, you first need to know what they are, and
what makes them different from the best wireless over-ear headphones. Earbuds
are listening devices that go inside your ear, instead of over them.

They are a classic and have been used for decades, but lately, it's also
becoming increasingly common for headphones to be wireless. By making the best
headphones wireless, you get the opportunity to venture outside without
getting tangled up in your cables. Both true wireless earbuds and wireless
earbuds allow for free movement, especially when exercising.

### Perfect Fit

Wireless headphones reviews can tell you which products are good and which
aren’t, but you also need to think about how a headphone will fit your ear,
and how well it will work for the activities you have in mind.

If you struggle to find earphones that feel comfortable when worn for a long
time, you should consider purchasing a product that comes with multiple tips
in different sizes. The size is usually the issue when wireless earbuds aren't
comfortable to wear, as everyone’s ears are shaped differently.

### Noise Reduction

The best wireless earbuds tend to be noise cancelling for the simple reason
that they go inside your ear. Some shut out more ambient noise than others,
which you will often find specified in the product description.

This will allow you to hear your sound when you're walking or running along a
busy street, or riding on a noisy bus. If noise cancellation is important to
you, look for a product that fits you right. Memory foam is a great material
for earbuds.

There is another reason, too, for why it is important to find a pair of
earphones that fit and that cancel out exterior noise, and this is to protect
your ears. Headphones that don’t fit right also won’t have proper noise
cancellation, which means you are likely to turn up the volume to hear your
music and your phone calls when out in busy environments, something that could
damage your ears permanently.

One thing to note is that noise cancelling headphones, or active noise
cancelling headphones tend to drain the battery life of your wireless buds.
However, that isn't so much of a problem here, as active noise cancelling
technology is usually found on headsets rather than buds. Active noise
cancelling headphones use active noise control to block out sound. If you're
looking for passive noise cancelling abilities, your buds should provide that.
Furthermore, this won't drain the battery life like an active noise cancelling
pair.

### What are the best budget wireless headphones?

Great headphones aren’t necessarily expensive, (we're looking at you, Apple
Airpods) Pro and it's possible to find in-ear earphones with great audio and
noise cancelling abilities, at a price you can afford. Pay attention to the
product specifications, to find what is right for you. Consider the SoundPEATS
headphones as a great alternative to some of the more expensive headphones,
like the Apple Airpods Pro.

### Do I have to wear in-ear headphones when working out?

You can wear over-the-ear [headphones when
exercising](https://musiccritic.com/equipment/headphones/best-exercise-
headphones/) and doing sports but chances are they won’t stay on your head
when you move. An earphone, whether truly wireless or not, stays in place,
provided you have chosen the right size and model and is, therefore, a better
choice for exercising.

### Conclusion

It can sound confusing at first, with all the different technical terms
related to earbuds. For the inexperienced shopper, it can seem like an
impossible task to get right. This is why we have put together a list of
products that meet our high standards, saving you the trouble of having to
weed out products that won’t live up to your expectations.

You don’t need to be an expert to find a set of headphones that you’ll be
happy with; all you need to do is to consider what you will be using them for,
what your budget is and what model you think will be the most comfortable for
you to wear.

If features like great bass and sound are something that matters a lot to you,
then it becomes additionally important to read the product specs. Consider
noise cancelling technology - would you prefer earphones with noise cancelling
capabilities? Do you need something with a long battery life? Would you like
your buds to be truly wireless? It doesn't have to be rocket science to find
the best in-ear earphones.

#### Expert Tip

If you're going to use the earphones for exercise, you will want to make sure
that you get a product that is water resistant and sweatproof.

#### Did You Know

Turning up the volume too much can cause serious ear damage, and this is why
[noise cancelling
headphones](https://musiccritic.com/equipment/headphones/best-noise-canceling-
headphones/) are recommended, as they require less volume in noisy
environments.
